function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 impact on construction workers' technical performance","Impact":"Potential reduction in construction workers and replacement of subcontractors","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide adequate training, and offer support for affected workers","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, contact tracing systems, and remote work solutions","People":"Construction workers, subcontractors, and construction stakeholders","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and government agencies"}]}
